description:
Attorney Louis M. Drazin founded our New Jersey law firm in 1947 with the goal of protecting the rights of injured victims and their families. Today, his sons continue to strive toward his original goal by offering the same high-quality legal services that earned their father a reputation as one of Ocean and Monmouth counties' leading personal injury lawyers. We now have three office locations, including our branch law office in Hazlet, where clients can get the assistance they need for matters related to the following:

  • Car, truck and motorcycle accidents
  • Dangerous products
  • Slip-and-fall accidents
  • Medical malpractice
  • Wrongful death

In addition to our personal injury practice, we also assist clients and families who face uncertainty due to workplace accidents. For injured workers, we offer guidance during the workers' compensation claims process, and for families of deceased workers, we offer support during the death benefits claims process.

Regardless of the source of your injury or loss, look no further than the law firm of Drazin and Warshaw, P.C., for the help you need. If you would like to discuss your legal need with one of our 11 experienced lawyers, we invite you to schedule a free initial consultation at our law office in Hazlet.
